Welcome to Voting is Power! Start by cho: Welcome to Voting is Power! Start by choosing your language:
Please accept the terms and conditions t: Please accept the terms and conditions to get started
University of California San Diego reque: VIP:Voice is a research prom by Praekelt Fdn, Democracy Intl & the U of California San Diego. Anonymous questions may be asked & stored
Study provides evaluation on how 2 use m: U cn withdraw, refuse 2 answer questions or take part. U may be excluded w/out notice. U will be informed of new info that may affect u
If u participate,we will ask questions a: If u participate,we'll ask questions about u & ur obs of the elections.U'll b anonymous.Answers are confidential&won't b shared.
To view full T&Cs please visit www.yal.m: Have questions / research-related issues? Contact C.Gibson 0118587605100. View full T&Cs visit http://.yal.mobi/vip
Thank you for your time. Remember, you c: Thank you for your time. Remember, you can always reconsider becoming a citizen reporter.
Please carefully enter your address agai: Please carefully re-enter your address again: for e.g.: 12 main street pretoria . Phone user hint: use # key to change to text mode
Thanks 4 joining!2 begin we need ur voti: Tx 4 joining! We need ur voting ward. Type ur home address & we'll work it out. This is prvt, only ur voting ward will be stored &u will be anonymous
Report an Election Activity: Report an Election Activity in ur Community
Thanks, u have answered all the question: Thanks, u have answered all the questions in this section.
What is the title of your report?: What is the title of your report?
Where did this event happen? Please be a: Where did this event happen? Please be as specific as possible and give address and city.
Please select the location from the opt: Please select the  location from the options below
Thank you for your report! Keep up the r: Thank u for ur report! Keep reporting & u may have a chance to be an official election day reporter where u can earn airtime or cash for ur contrib
You are 1 of {{ registered }} citizens w: You are 1 of {{ registered }} citizens who are active citizen election reporters! {{ reports }} election activity posts have been submitted.
The VIP-Ask is a multi-channel political: VIP-Ask is a multichannel political engagement portal.VIP: Ask will engage S. Africans from all walks of life to report on electoral activities,
voice their opinions on current issues s: voice their opinions on current issues surrounding the elections, and report on election processes on voting day.
VIP:Ask is a partnership between academi: VIP:Ask is a partnership between academics, Democracy International, Livity Africa and the Praekelt Foundation
Did you vote in the 2009 election?: Did you vote in the 2009 election?
Thank you for telling VIP a bit more abo: Thank you for telling VIPa bit more about yourself! If you are a lucky winner your airtime will be sent to you shortly.
Please give us your cellphone number so: Please give us your cellphone number as you stand a chance to win airtime!

People in my neighborhood look down on t: People in my neighborhood look down on those who do not vote:

How do you rate the overall performance of your local government councillor?

None, I have not been contacted: None, I have not been contacted

How much do you trust the Economic Freed: How much do you trust the Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF)?
During the past year, how often have you: During the past year, how often have u or anyone in ur family gone without enough food to eat?
